creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pale blue light weight waisband with flimsy ties; midsection blue and white horizontal print with tiny stitched pleats except center front; lower section in black with strong red horizontal band with geometric cross stitching in white, black, brown and red, alternating with narrow white braid; lower section lined in pale blue cotton
dimension: 28 1/4 x 33 1/4 in. (71.76 x 84.46 cm) (not including ties)
title: Skirt
